name: Mom's Crazy Cabbage
ingredients: 1 small cabbage, coarsely chopped, about 1 pound 13 ounces before trimming

instructions.en: Brown ground beef and onion in a large skillet; drain grease and season with salt and pepper.
instructions.sk: Opečte mleté mäso a cibuľu na veľkej panvici; zlejte mastnotu a ochuťte soľou a korením.
instructions.ja: 大きなフライパンで挽肉と玉ねぎを炒めて茶色くし、脂を切り、塩コショウで味付けします。

instructions.en: Layer half the chopped cabbage in a greased 9x13 inch baking dish. Season with salt and pepper.
instructions.sk: Rozložte polovicu nasekanej kapusty do vymastenej 23x33 cm zapekacej formy. Ochuťte soľou a korením.
instructions.ja: グリースを塗った9x13インチの焼き皿に刻んだキャベツの半分を敷きます。塩コショウで味付けします。

instructions.en: Top cabbage with meat mixture, then remaining cabbage. Season again.
instructions.sk: Na kapustu položte mäsovú zmes, potom zvyšnú kapustu. Znovu ochuťte.
instructions.ja: キャベツの上に肉の混ぜ物をのせ、さらに残りのキャベツをのせます。再度味付けします。

instructions.en: Pour diced tomatoes evenly over cabbage and lay bacon strips on top. Cover with foil.
instructions.sk: Rovnomerne nalejte kocky paradajok na kapustu a položte na vrch plátky slaniny. Prikryte fóliou.
instructions.ja: キャベツの上にダイストマトを均等にかけ、ベーコンを並べます。アルミホイルで覆います。

instructions.en: Bake at 325°F for 3 hours. Discard bacon before serving.
instructions.sk: Pečte pri 165°C 3 hodiny. Pred podávaním odstráňte slaninu.
instructions.ja: 325°F（165°C）のオーブンで3時間焼きます。提供前にベーコンを取り除きます。

notes: Makes 6 servings. Can be frozen. Use a small cabbage (about 1.5 pounds after trimming) to ensure it fits in the baking dish.
